title: The pleasures of love and marriage a poem in praise of the fair sex, in requital for The folly of love, and some other late satyrs on women.
author: Ames, Richard, d. 1693.
publisher: Printed for H.N. and are to be sold by R. Baldwin ...,
notes: Attributed to Richard Ames. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
